frame.name: Becoming_visible
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> that is previously not visible to a <fen>Perceiver</fen> becomes visible.
<ex><fex name="Entity">The armada</fex> <t>appeared</t> <fex name="Place">on the horizon</fex> <fex name="Time">at sunset</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The captain ordered his men to dig at the X and <fex name="Entity">the corner of a chest</fex> <t>appeared</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The thing that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> is able to see or recognize.</def-root>

FE.name: Perceiver
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who is able to see the <fen>Entity</fen>. This FE is often null-instantiated as it is deprofiled in this scene.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of how the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes visible that is not covered by more specific FEs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The physical location in which the <fen>Entity</fen> becomes visible.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>A temporal description of the event of the <fen>Entity</fen> becoming visible.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: appear.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: come into view; become visible or noticeable
